newsitem.title: USA: Alkermes, J&J unit in Medisorb pact.
newsitem.headline: Alkermes, J&J unit in Medisorb pact.

text.p: Alkermes Inc said Thursday that it has signed an agreement to supply Janssen Pharmaceutica, a division of Johnson & Johnson, with commercial quantities of its Medisorb injectable sustained release formulation of a Janssen proprietary product.
Alkermes said that it is beginning expansion of its manufacturing facilities to support potential future commercial scale production of the product.
Financial terms of the agreement were not disclosed.

Alkermes' Medisorb drug delivery system enables the creation of injectable sustained release formulations of traditional small-molecule pharmaceutical compounds by encapsulating them in microspheres made of common medical polymers.
